data.question: What is the publication year of the article titled 'X-ray structure determination of [1-cyano-2,.2-dimtheylcyclopropyllithium.cntdot.tetrahydrofuran].infin.: a tetrahedral anionic .alpha.-cyano carbon atom'?
Who are the authors of the article with DOI 10.1021/ja00228a073?
data.answer: Gernot Boche, Klaus Harms, Michael Marsch
